name: ffi::c_str::<impl core::convert::From<ffi::c_str::CString> for sync::Arc<core::ffi::CStr>>::from

ffi::c_str::CString::into_inner.doc: Bypass "move out of struct which implements [`Drop`] trait" restriction.

core::convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

doc: Converts a [`CString`] into an [Arc]<[CStr]> by moving the [`CString`] data into a new [`Arc`] buffer.
